identity.name: ANITA | Art of Beauty
identity.target_audience: Women 20-55, MosonmagyarÃ³vÃ¡r, seeking premium beauty services

usage.label: font-sans text-xs uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-primary font-bold

modes.services: Asymmetric grid (Bento) - mixing large images with price lists
modes.about: Split screen editorial - Text left, Image right (sticky)
modes.contact: Split screen - Map/Info left, Form right

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A1A1A] text-white hover:bg-[#D4AF37] rounded-none px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#1A1A1A] text-[#1A1A1A] hover:bg-[#1A1A1A] hover:text-white rounded-none px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs transition-all duration-300

cards.service: bg-white p-8 border border-[#E6DCCF] hover:border-[#D4AF37] transition-all duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.price_item: flex justify-between items-baseline border-b border-dashed border-[#E6DCCF] pb-2 mb-4

form.input: bg-transparent border-b border-[#1A1A1A] rounded-none px-0 py-4 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-0 placeholder:text-[#1A1A1A]/50
form.label: uppercase text-xs tracking-widest mb-2 block

visual_enhancers.decorations: Gold foil lines, abstract geometric shapes in background

animations.hover: Slow zoom on images, color shift on borders

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings to achieve the editorial look.
Implement a smooth scroll behavior (Lenis recommended if possible, otherwise CSS scroll-behavior: smooth).
Ensure generous whitespace (py-24 or py-32) between sections.
Do not use standard card shadows. Use borders and subtle hover states.
The 'Gold' color (#D4AF37) should be used sparingly as an accent (lines, buttons, active states), not as a main background.
Images must be treated as art pieces - use aspect-ratio-square or aspect-ratio-[3/4] with object-cover.
For the 'Services' section, avoid a simple list. Use a grid where some cells are images and others are price lists.
Contact form should feel like a personal letter, not a data entry point.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ğŸ¤–ğŸ§ ğŸ’­ğŸ’¡ğŸ”®ğŸ¯ğŸ“šğŸ­ğŸ¬ğŸªğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸğŸ€ğŸ‚ğŸ°ğŸˆğŸ¨ğŸ°ğŸ’°ğŸ’µğŸ’³ğŸ¦ğŸ’ğŸª™ğŸ’¸ğŸ¤‘ğŸ“ŠğŸ“ˆğŸ“‰ğŸ’¹ğŸ”¢ğŸ†ğŸ¥‡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
